name: test_e2e_with_logs[473_GQL_DOS_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_DOS_002` |
| **Name** | GraphQL deep nested DoS with mass extraction |
| **Category** | GRAPHQL |
| **Subcategory** | dos |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `query{users(first:999){posts(first:999){comments(first:999){text} } } }`
- **Encoded**: `query%7Busers(first%3A999)%7Bposts(first%3A999)%7Bcomments(first%3A999)%7Btext%7D%20%7D%20%7D%20%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~48000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:44:25.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX GraphQL Attack] Mass data extraction attempt test_id=GQL_DOS_002-1771076665349-zwscv pattern_id=GQL_DOS_002 uri=/?q=query%7Busers(first%3A999)%7Bposts(first%3A999)%7Bcomments(first%3A999)%7Btext%7D%20%7D%20%7D%20%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
